price: Mwambieni maneno laini, huenda akazingatia au akaogopa.
arabic: فَقُولَا لَهُۥ قَوۡلٗا لَّيِّنٗا لَّعَلَّهُۥ يَتَذَكَّرُ أَوۡ يَخۡشَىٰ

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: faqūlā lahu qawlan layyinan laʿallahu yatadhakkaru aw yakhshā
